exception.description: Invoked when the cost of job exceeds the expected value.
Invoked when a job exceeds its expected duration.
Invoked when an activity exceeds its expected duration.
Invoked when a Script Object fails to execute automatically.
Invoked when a process is stalled.
Invoked when an activity crosses the due date.
Invoked when no usable resource is assigned to an activity.
Invoked when a .NET object fails to execute.
Invoked when a Web Service object fails to execute.
Invoked when a C# Script activity fails to execute when running automatically.
Invoked when a VB .NET Script activity fails to execute.
Invoked when a Data Access activity fails to execute.
Invoked when the transfer of documents to another server fails to execute.
Invoked when any automatic activity fails to execute.

dataaccess.dasquery: <datamanipulationstmt><connectionstringvariable>DB_CUSTOM</connectionstringvariable><connectionstring /><sql>SELECT [order_id] FROM [UBW_Orderinfo] WHERE (( [apar_id] = [@INPUT_CREDNR]) AND ( [order_id] = [@INPUT_ORDERNR]))</sql><PreviewSql>SELECT [order_id] FROM [UBW_Orderinfo] WHERE (( [apar_id] = [@input_credNr]) AND ( [order_id] = [@Input_ordernr]))</PreviewSql><sqlobjecttype>0</sqlobjecttype><sqloperationtype>0</sqloperationtype><queryreturnsmultiplerows>1</queryreturnsmultiplerows><usesaggrfunctions>0</usesaggrfunctions><querydoesmultipleupdate>0</querydoesmultipleupdate><querydoesmultipleinsert>0</querydoesmultipleinsert><countrows>0</countrows><fields><field><name>order_id</name><type>0</type></field></fields><parameters><parameter><name>INPUT_CREDNR</name><type>0</type></parameter><parameter><name>INPUT_ORDERNR</name><type>0</type></parameter></parameters><storedprocedure><procedurename /><procedureparameters /></storedprocedure></datamanipulationstmt>
